overview: Men of Montreal presents Volume 24. On this video, we meet Derek. Busy doing nothing, he receives a call from that hot dude, Brandon. Apparently, he got into a fight with his boyfriend and was kicked out. So now Brandon is in a hotel room, all by himself, lonely and horny - that's a chance Derek won't miss. As soon as Derek gets into the room, Brandon's ass is already waiting and available for him. They start with a sweet kiss, and clothes disappeared in a matter of seconds. Derek, with his huge cock, get inside Brandon's tight little hole, and gives him the ride of his life. Enjoy this and much more.
title: Men Of Montreal Vol. 24
